content: crochet an adorable daffodil turtle 100% no sew pattern not even one part to sew easy to crochet turtle plush it will make the best gift for your kids or even a friend who loves turtles easy and quick pattern it will take you about one hour to make it the turtle is crocheted using the no-sew method first we will crochet the fins and head and later attach them as we crochet along skill level easy materials plush yarn 100gr 120m hook size 4mm safety eyes- any size between 14-25mm fiberfill for stuffing -stitch marker optional -tapestry needle if you have any questions contact us via private message
